title: Jesse Perring?
body: So I was reading Lee Sin's abilities and I read his ultimate: Dragons Rage and it said it was taught to him by Jessy Perring. Si my question is, who the hell is Jessie Perring I looked him up and he is apparently like Chuck Norris 2.0

replies.body: Chuck Norris is the lovechild of Jesse Perring and Jesse Perring.
cuck norris wishes he was anything like jesse perring.
When Lee Sin uses his ult, he knocks the enemy champion a short distance. When Jesse Perring does it he knocks both teams off the map
jesse perring is so great. Mejai's Soulstealer is his diary.

It's an extremely old joke (around beta to S1) of an employee at Riot named Jesse Perring and people simply talk of him like Chuck Norris for some reason. I am not sure if he's still at Riot, but last time I heard he was part of player support. He isn't talked much about anymore.

So you answered your question and posted why? 

Lo-el
